thread.title: Eugene Zuta, Ohemaa Mercy, others give sterling performance at The Maker's House
thread.title_full: Eugene Zuta, Ohemaa Mercy, others give sterling performance at The Maker's House

title: Eugene Zuta, Ohemaa Mercy, others give sterling performance at The Maker's House
text:
Date: 02-10-2015 Time: 11:10:10:am EUgene Zuta (Left), Ps. Isaiah (Middle) and Ohemaa Mercy (Right). 
A number of Ghana's finest Gospel Artistes led thousands of worshipers at The Maker's House Chapel International (TMHCI), to a praise and worship encounter, over the weekend. 
The praise and worship event, which took place on Saturday, September 26, 2015, was dubbed "My Heart Sings". The worship encounter also precedes the annual Experience Conference slated for October 4-11, 2015. 
Worshipers were thrilled by performances from Eugene Zuta, Pastor Isaiah, Ohemaa Mercy, Sandra Afreh, Kwadwo Tuffuor (The Psalmist) and the Destiny Choir of the Maker's House Chapel International among many others. 
The Experience Conference is the flagship annual international conference of the Maker’s House Chapel International which brings together many people, irrespective of their political affiliation, colour, race and ethnicity, under one roof to commune and have an encounter with God. 
This life-changing conference is hosted by Dr. Michael Boadi Nyamekye at the Maker’s House Chapel international located at Kwabenya in Accra. 
In a brief exhortation, General Overseer of TMHCI, Dr. Michael Boadi Nyamekye announced that there will be a special prayer and prophetic meeting on Saturday, October 10, 2015 from 6:00am to 10:00am. 
The 2015 Experience Conference is the third edition and is under the theme "Divine Turnaround". 
Speakers at this year’s Experience Conference are Dr. Michael Boadi Nyamekye, Rev Dr Ampiah Kwofie and Rev Eastwood Anaba. 
Gospel Artistes ministering during the conference include Uncle Ato, Daughters of Glorious Jesus, Ohemaa Mercy, Becky Bonnie, Grace Ashy, Destiny Choir, Kojo Tuffour (the Psalmist) and many others.
